Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLIView, GUIView
public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
Super abstract class that is used to make it transparent to the client the using of cli or gui. Dynamically instantiated as ClIView or GUIView in serverHandler, it will be called inside messages' clientProcess methods
